attributes.action: Stop the discrimination against divorced fathers and support the Childrens right to see both parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you as interested in childrens and fathers rights, as you are in pay as you go road charging? Last week,after the shooting of a boy in London, David Cameron and Tony Blair stated that fathers should play a more active role in their childrens upbringing (citing the breakdown of the family as one reason for crime)...I've been trying to see my son properly for 3 years (he's now 4 1/2). The courts and cafcass do nothing. Now we've heard the words, lets see some action.. I also note whilst writing this that there is no category entitled "Family" to choose from...that says something.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
